item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my first post, world. Stick around a bit, there’s lots more to come. My first set of posts will include a lot of Unity learning progress updates mainly based around a 12 part course from Zenva Academy (https://academy.zenva.com/product/discover-unity-game-development-from-zero-to-12-games/).
